report.title: Broad scale habitats for population call
report.description: Return a list of broad scale habitats (no termlists_terms.parent_id) for a lookup parameter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM terms hab JOIN termlists_terms tt on tt.term_id=hab.id AND tt.deleted=false AND parent_id IS NULL JOIN termlists tl on tl.id=tt.termlist_id AND tl.title='NPMS 2015 habitats' AND tl.deleted=false WHERE hab.deleted=false AND hab.term != 'Not in scheme'
